attributes.action: Close clubs/pubs/restaurants down for appropriate amount of time amidst COVID19
attributes.additional_details: People will not listen to preventive measures till uk ends on lockdown or tougher enforcement is in place. It is necessary to prevent as many cases and deaths as possible.
attributes.background: We would like the government to at least consider closing restaurants, pubs and clubs down in the coming weeks or as soon as possible, in addition to taking necessary actions to prevent further spread.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
